title: Fragments of an honorific inscription
support: Two fragments of a moderately thick limestone plaque, seemingly broken on all sides, and which appear almost to join. Fragment 1 (left) is c.18cm wide and 21.5 cm high; Fragment 2 (right) is c.13.2 cm wide and c.20.8 cm high

layout.p: Two lines of large Latin letters

handNote.lettering: Tall, deeply cut letters with simple serifs and three-pointed serifs.

provenanceFound._: The right-hand fragment (2) found  in the theatre in 1841 (so Mommsen in CIL), and seen by Mommsen prior to 1883; fragment 1 first recorded by Manganaro 1989.

museum.name: Antiquarium del Teatro Antico
museum.description: The collection in the "Casina degli Inglesi" consists of 20 inscriptions, 1 statue, two busts, a few mosaics, a 2nd C AD marble sarcophagus and some modern art
